issue.title: [CI] Add docker container to inspect docker context
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4907](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4907). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The larger the docker context the slower the docker build. Adding a small container to inspect the context helps to curate a good `.dockerignore`.
